title: The Lodger Shakespeare: His Life on Silver Street
description: A historical account of Shakespeare's participation in an 1612 court case involving an unpaid marriage dowry offers insight into the bard's obscure private life, in a volume that draws on a wide variety of sources to piece together the environment in which such plays as Othello, Measure for Measure, and King Lear were written. 30,000 first printing.
author: Charles Nicholl
